incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue Auto-Recharge triggers firing incorrectly, starting June 13th and are working to deploy a fix. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.

We continue experiencing Auto-Recharge triggers firing incorrectly, starting June 13th. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems detected an issue with Auto-Recharge triggers firing incorrectly starting June 13th. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified an issue for some customers using Messaging Insights, specifically Delivery and Errors -> Outbound Insights is currently unavailable.  They are investigating the root cause and are working to deploy a fix.  We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Messaging Insights. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Issues With Onboarding New Numbers or Deprovisioning 10DLC Numbers

incident_updates.body: We are still investigating delays when trying to onboard new numbers, or deprovisioning numbers on T-Mobile 10DLC A2P. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The K-Telecom network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 26 June 2023 at 16:00 PDT until 26 June 2023 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from K-Telecom Russia handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body:
The Zain network in Iraq is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 26 July 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 14 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Zain Iraq handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

26 June 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 26 June 2023 at 22:00 PDT
03 July 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 03 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT
04 July 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 04 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT
05 July 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 05 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT
07 July 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 07 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT
08 July 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 08 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT
09 July 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 09 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT
10 July 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 10 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT
11 July 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 11 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT
14 July 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 14 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Italy and Greece is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 June 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 26 June 2023 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Greece and Italy handsets

The Vietnamobile network in Vietnam is conducting an emergency maintenance from 27 June 2023 at 10:00 PDT until 27 June 2023 at 12:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Vietnamobile Vietnam handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 June 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 27 June 2023 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and failures for calls to and from a subset of Twilio Ireland phone numbers.
We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 June 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 27 June 2023 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and failures for calls to and from a subset of Twilio Ireland phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Carrier Partner EE UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 June 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 28 June 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for EE UK customers.
Impacted Products: SNA, Lookup SIM Swap and Identity Match

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Service Partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 June 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 28 June 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destination: Canada
Impacted Products: Silent Network Authentication (SNA), Lookup SIM Swap, Identity Match

incident_updates.body: The ONE XOX Sdn Bhd network in the Malaysia is conducting a planned  maintenance from 07 July 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 07 July 2023 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from ONE XOX Sdn Bhd Malaysia handsets.
